name: MPL Plotter 5.5
body:
### Contour plotting method
Unifying matplotlib's contour, contourf and plt.clabel methods.

### Other improvements
- Default color_rules for the heatmap and surface plotters
- Mock data methods refactored

name: MPL Plotter 5.4
body:
* Font typeface and family input
* 3D tick label customization improved

name: MPL Plotter 5.3
body:
- Reimplemented and improved the color bar method, adding full support for floating colorbars and generalizing it to 2 and 3D plots
- Resolved a series of bugs in the 3D plotting methods and improved the code base
- Increased test coverage

name: MPL Plotter 5.2.0
body: Typesetting methods generalized, improved and documented.

name: MPL Plotter 5.1.3
body: LICENSE included in PyPi source code distributions.

name: MPL Plotter 5.1.2
body:
Improvements for 2D plotting methods.

- Axis bound input validation and defaults improved
- Title padding correctly working

name: MPL Plotter 5.1.1
body: 2D axis tick bound and location methods recovered, minor bugs resolved.

name: MPL Plotter 5.1.0
body:
`panes` now accepts a `shape` argument so as to use user-defined plot grids. Check the [`matplotlib.pyplot.subplot2grid`](https://matplotlib.org/3.1.1/api/_as_gen/matplotlib.pyplot.subplot2grid.html)) documentation for more information on the `shape` parameter.

Major internal rewrite.

name: MPL Plotter 5.0.1
body: API inconsistencies corrected.

name: MPL Plotter 5.0
body: Major internal rewrite and breaking API changes.

name: MPL Plotter 4.2.1
body: Removed color bar title size bug

name: MPL Plotter 4.2
body: Significant pane plot improvements.

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 7
body: Demo pads: custom bounds bug corrected.

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 6
body: Cleaned dependencies and improved code documentation.

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 5
body: Comparison function: restored control over automatic curve color assignment.

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 4
body:
- Heatmaps: axis bounds bug corrected, input restricted to NumPy arrays
- Code quality improvements

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 3
body:
General:
- Improved control over tick number.

Comparison:
- Added support for multiple x arrays

Panes
- Added support for multiple x arrays and lists of arrays
- Added figure as input
- Added control over plt.subplots_adjust axis positioning parameters (top, bottom, left, right, wspace, hspace)

Scatter plots:
- Marker class: retrieve all available Matplotlib scatter markers by index (sorted by personal preference), solid or hollow

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 2
body: Comparison function: added control over automatic curve color assignment.

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0 post-release 1
body: Row support added to panes plotting function.

name: MPL Plotter 4.1.0
body:
Major rewrite of the `comparison` and `panes` functions to generalize their use to plots with:
- Multiple panels
- Multiple curves in each panel

where the curves may share an `x` or have their own, and where plural arguments may be passed to the functions to be applied to all panels or curves.

name: MPL Plotter 4.0.5
body:
# Python 3.6
Extended MPL Plotter compatibility to Python >= 3.6.9.

name: MPL Plotter 4.0.4
body:
### Package install
`Python-Alexandria` required minimum version (2.0.0) specified in setup.py to ensure that
`pip install mpl_plotter --upgrade`
upgrades `Python-Alexandria` if a lower version is currently installed.

name: MPL Plotter 4.0.3
body: Unified panes implementation, updated documentation.

name: MPL Plotter 4.0.2
body: Color modification functions, color scheme and maps modules unified.

name: MPL Plotter 4.0.1
body: Color modification functions, color scheme and maps modules unified.

name: MPL Plotter 4.0.0
body:
Large improvements, including breaking changes.

## Functionality
- Library structure improved
     - Many refactorings. Please check the library map in the README for reference.
     - Code cleaned and documented to have better maintainability.
- Comparison method improved
- Pane plots improved

## Documentation
- Automatic documentation with pdoc3 implemented
- API reference website up
- General improvements

## Development
- CONTRIBUTING.md

name: MPL Plotter 3.9.2
body:
New functionality:
- Panes
   - Comparison function ready for standalone use
   - All library plot parameters passable to pane functions without conflicts
- Single coordinate plots
Bug fixes
- Custom canvas no coordinate customization improved

name: MPL Plotter 3.8.8
body:
New features:
- Presets available and in working order for all available plots. Demos included in the README

Improvements:
- 3D plots
    - Tick label positioning, rotation
- Install:
    - Requirements fixed. Automatic install of all dependencies should be smooth now.
    - requirements.txt included to ensure user's dependencies are up to date with repo dependencies

name: MPL Plotter 3.8.5
body:
Project health:
- Tests improved. Coverage.py calculation automated and coverage badge included in README. 
Improvements:
- `aspect`: Aspect ratio now working as expected.
- `pane_fill`: Pane fill for 3D plots works as intended.
- Organization and redability improvements in the 3D plotting code.
Extra functionality:
- Available fonts utility: call `get_available_fonts` to see a printed, numbered list of all the fonts available for Matplotlib in your machine.
- `scale`: Scale parameter added to allow defining a scale between the y and x axis.
- `blend_edges`: Blend spine color into 3D plot pane fill color.

name: MPL Plotter 3.8.3
body:
Simple and effective plotting library. Fully functional plotting classes and presets. Still much to be done, but pretty much fully equipped for most situations. Cheers!

![subplot2grid_demo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47611105/117854067-659d3f80-b289-11eb-8d0e-a36a0cced3fd.png)
